title: Open Source Funding Best Practices | Sustainability and Growth
description: Learn best practices for funding open source projects to ensure sustainability, security, and growth. Explore diverse funding sources, transparent budgets, and successful funding examples like Vue.js, OpenSSL, and Django.
keywords: open source funding, funding best practices, GitHub Sponsors, Open Collective, Patreon, corporate sponsorship, open source sustainability, transparent budgets, open source project maintenance, Django Fellowship, Vue.js funding, OpenSSL funding
